name: Student Stampede
description:
Originally created in late 2014/early 2015.

A one-button level-based runner! Collect all your chosen student's items in just 8 levels set around and in the University of the Witswatersrand's campus!

Commissioned by the University of the Witswatersrand while we were in 3rd year. Meant to act as a way to make new students excited about the University. Lowest common denominator of skill needed to be able to play - hence the oversimplicity.

*I am not affiliated with University of the Witswatersrand, or do I own full rights to this game, I guess - please don't sue me.*

Luc Wolthers: Art/Animation

Sean Goncalves: Production; sound/music; additional art/animation

Ben Myres: Level / system design; programming
